channel.title: Highscores Issue
channel.description:
I am hosting my highscores with Mezoka Hosting service...
It all went well, I uploaded all my highscores files.
But now I have the Error "Table 'mezok_7740113_highscores.skillsoverall' doesn't exist"
Im not sure what I did...

item.title: Highscores Issue
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Table 'mezok_7740113_highscores.skillsoverall' [b]doesn't exist[/b]

Well that’s pretty self explanatory, the table doesn’t exist. If you’re following deathschaos9s tutorials I suggest you read it again.

Step 4: Open the XAMPP control panel and click the MySQL admin button. Enter your username and password, you will be redirected to a different page.

In the middle of page you see white boxes, and there should be a box with text “create database”. type in that box “highscores” and press “create”.
Now you need to add tables, there are two options.
Option one - Click the import button at the top of the page and press “browse”. Navigate to the highscores folder, and there is a file called hiscore.sql select it.
Option two - Click the SQL button at the top of the page, open hiscore.sql from the highscores folder, copy its content and paste it into the text box on the page.

Read full topic

item.title: Highscores Issue
item.dc:creator: @P_E P E
item.description:
@P_E wrote:

You must of deleted a file by mistake.

Read full topic
